dumpObj.title: Instance of class 'class' as defined in module 'Song'
dumpObj.documentation: This class represents a Live set.

method.name: continue_playing
method.doc:
continue_playing( (Song)arg1) -> None : Continue playing the song from the current position
C++ signature : void continue_playing(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: get_beats_loop_length
method.doc:
get_beats_loop_length( (Song)arg1) -> BeatTime : Get const access to the songs loop length, using a BeatTime class with the current global set signature.
C++ signature : NPythonSong::TBeatTime get_beats_loop_length(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: get_beats_loop_start
method.doc:
get_beats_loop_start( (Song)arg1) -> BeatTime : Get const access to the songs loop start, using a BeatTime class with the current global set signature.
C++ signature : NPythonSong::TBeatTime get_beats_loop_start(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: get_current_beats_song_time
method.doc:
get_current_beats_song_time( (Song)arg1) -> BeatTime : Get const access to the songs current playing position, using a BeatTime class with the current global set signature.
C++ signature : NPythonSong::TBeatTime get_current_beats_song_time(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: get_current_smpte_song_time
method.doc:
get_current_smpte_song_time( (Song)arg1, (int)arg2) -> SmptTime : Get const access to the songs current playing position, by specifying the SMPTE format in which you would like to receive the time.
C++ signature : NPythonSong::TSmptTime get_current_smpte_song_time(TPyHandle<ASong>,long)

method.name: is_cue_point_selected
method.doc:
is_cue_point_selected( (Song)arg1) -> bool : Return true if the global playing pos is currently on a cue point.
C++ signature : bool is_cue_point_selected(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: jump_by
method.doc:
jump_by( (Song)arg1, (float)arg2) -> None : Set a new playing pos, relative to the current one.
C++ signature : void jump_by(TPyHandle<ASong>,double)

method.name: jump_to_next_cue
method.doc:
jump_to_next_cue( (Song)arg1) -> None : Jump to the next cue (marker) if possible.
C++ signature : void jump_to_next_cue(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: jump_to_prev_cue
method.doc:
jump_to_prev_cue( (Song)arg1) -> None : Jump to the prior cue (marker) if possible.
C++ signature : void jump_to_prev_cue(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: play_selection
method.doc:
play_selection( (Song)arg1) -> None : Start playing the current set selection, or do nothing if no selection is set.
C++ signature : void play_selection(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: redo
method.doc:
redo( (Song)arg1) -> None : Redo the last action that was undone.
C++ signature : void redo(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: scrub_by
method.doc:
scrub_by( (Song)arg1, (float)arg2) -> None : Same as jump_by, but does not stop playback.
C++ signature : void scrub_by(TPyHandle<ASong>,double)

method.name: set_or_delete_cue
method.doc:
set_or_delete_cue( (Song)arg1) -> None : When a cue is selected, it gets deleted. If no cue is selected, a new cue is created at the current global songtime.
C++ signature : void set_or_delete_cue(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: start_playing
method.doc:
start_playing( (Song)arg1) -> None : Start playing from the startmarker
C++ signature : void start_playing(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: stop_all_clips
method.doc:
stop_all_clips( (Song)arg1) -> None : Stop all playing Clips (if any) but continue playing the Song.
C++ signature : void stop_all_clips(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: stop_playing
method.doc:
stop_playing( (Song)arg1) -> None : Stop playing the Song.
C++ signature : void stop_playing(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: tap_tempo
method.doc:
tap_tempo( (Song)arg1) -> None : Trigger the tap tempo function.
C++ signature : void tap_tempo(TPyHandle<ASong>)

method.name: undo
method.doc:
undo( (Song)arg1) -> None : Undo the last action that was made.
C++ signature : void undo(TPyHandle<ASong>)

attribute.name: View
attribute.type: Representing the view aspects of a Live document: The Session and Arrangerview.

attribute.name: appointed_device
attribute.type: Access to the selected Device

attribute.name: back_to_arranger
attribute.type: Get/Set if triggering a Clip in the Session, disabled the playback of Clips in the Arranger.

attribute.name: can_jump_to_next_cue
attribute.type: Returns true when there is a cue marker right to the playing pos that we could jump to.

attribute.name: can_jump_to_prev_cue
attribute.type: Returns true when there is a cue marker left to the playing pos that we could jump to.

attribute.name: can_redo
attribute.type: Returns true if there is an undone action that we can redo.

attribute.name: can_undo
attribute.type: Returns true if there is an action that we can restore.

attribute.name: canonical_parent
attribute.type: Get the canonical parent of the song.

attribute.name: clip_trigger_quantization
attribute.type: Get/Set access to the quantization settings that are used to fire Clips in the Session.

attribute.name: cue_points
attribute.type: Const access to a list of all cue points of the Live Song.

attribute.name: current_song_time
attribute.type: Get/Set access to the songs current playing position in ms.

attribute.name: exclusive_arm
attribute.type: Get if Tracks should be armed exclusively by default.

attribute.name: exclusive_solo
attribute.type: Get if Tracks should be soloed exclusively by default.

attribute.name: groove_amount
attribute.type: Get/Set the global groove amount, that adjust all setup grooves in all clips.

attribute.name: is_playing
attribute.type: Returns true if the Song is currently playing.

attribute.name: last_event_time
attribute.type: Return the time of the last set event in the song. In contrary to song_length, this will not add some extra beats that are mostly needed for Display purposes in the Arrangerview.

attribute.name: loop
attribute.type: Get/Set the the looping flag that en/disables the usage of the global loop markers in the song.

attribute.name: loop_length
attribute.type: Get/Set the lenght of the global loop marker position in beats.

attribute.name: loop_start
attribute.type: Get/Set the start of the global loop marker position in beats.

attribute.name: master_track
attribute.type: Access to the Master Track (always available)

attribute.name: metronome
attribute.type: Get/Set if the metronom is audible.

attribute.name: midi_recording_quantization
attribute.type: Get/Set access to the settings that are used to quantize MIDI recordings.

attribute.name: nudge_down
attribute.type: Get/Set the status of the nudge down button.

attribute.name: nudge_up
attribute.type: Get/Set the status of the nudge up button.

attribute.name: overdub
attribute.type: Get/Set the global overdub/replace state.

attribute.name: punch_in
attribute.type: Get/Set the flag that will enable recording as soon as the Song plays and hits the global loop start region.

attribute.name: punch_out
attribute.type: Get/Set the flag that will disable recording as soon as the Song plays and hits the global loop end region.

attribute.name: record_mode
attribute.type: Get/Set the state of the global recording flag.

attribute.name: return_tracks
attribute.type: Const access to the list of available Return Tracks.

attribute.name: scenes
attribute.type: Const access to a list of all Scenes in the Live Song.

attribute.name: select_on_launch
attribute.type: Get if Scenes and Clips should be selected when fired.

attribute.name: signature_denominator
attribute.type: Get/Set access to the global signature denominator of the Song.

attribute.name: signature_numerator
attribute.type: Get/Set access to the global signature numerator of the Song.

attribute.name: song_length
attribute.type: Return the time of the last set event in the song, plus som extra beats that are usually added for better navigation in the arrangerview.

attribute.name: tempo
attribute.type: Get/Set the global project tempo.

attribute.name: tracks
attribute.type: Const access to a list of all Player Tracks in the Live Song, exluding the return and Master Track (see also Song.send_tracks and Song.master_track). At least one MIDI or Audio Track is always available.

attribute.name: view
attribute.type: Representing the view aspects of a Live document: The Session and Arrangerview.

attribute.name: visible_tracks
attribute.type: Const access to a list of all visible Player Tracks in the Live Song, exluding the return and Master Track (see also Song.send_tracks and Song.master_track). At least one MIDI or Audio Track is always available.
